name: Soulmaster
overview: Soulmaster is a board game that use rpg elements in the battle parts. The battle parts use card to make the different attacks and summon different monsters that the player catched to help him during the battles. The game plot in the story mode is about 4 different characters compete in different missions that are ordered by their teachers in the magicians school. In each mission the square in the center of the board is the level boss once is defeated the mission is completed. There are different attack cards with different kind of spells and phisical attacks. The game took place in places like Farlaine, A'Shen, Liaragel, Grädje, Maglee or Rosgalia. The game features a 3d mode for the board and for the battle parts that can also be played in a static 2d mode if the player choose it on the options menu of the game. There are 3 game modes: Story mode, Free mode (up to 4 players) and vs mode.
